steps.name: Given a room with dimensions "7" by "4"
And a hoover starting at position "0", "0"
And the following patches of dirt: "1,1;3,3"
When the hoover moves according to "EENNNNNNWWSSS"
Then the final position of the hoover should be "4", "1"
